page.title: 09MY DAY/RURAL CHILD/GOOSE GRN
page.content: My name is Gareth. I am 11 and I live on a Company farm called Highfield. I wake early every day and always have a cooked breakfast,usually bacon,egg and toast,sometimes with cereals. Then I go out to see what is happening on the farm & talk to the farm staff. During the holidays & week_ends I help at a nearby farm,washing cars or gardening. The farmer gives me a lift home,and after a bath I have my lunch at 1 p.m. Mum always gives us a good meal,meat, vegetables and pudding. As no-one of my age lives nearby I have friends to stay sometimes. Often Mum takes me and my sister swimming where we have great fun. Tea is at 5 p.m.,usually something on toast,and then we watch television,play games or I ride my bike. I normally go to bed after the 9 o'clock news,very tired!
